original_title: Peppa Pig: International Day And other stories
overview: Peppa is a loveable, cheeky little piggy who lives with her younger brother George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig. Peppy loves playing games, dressing up, visiting exciting places and making new friends, but her absolutely favourite thing is Jumping up and down in muddy puddles!
title: Peppa Pig: International Day And other stories
